doc.previous: The trigonometric functions can be defined in other ways besides the geometrical definitions above using tools from calculus and infinite series With these definitions the trigonometric functions can be defined for complex numbers The complex exponential function is particularly useful
doc.after: See Euler s and De Moivre s formulas
